mapper.select: SELECT P.* , M.*, C.* FROM PROD P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE PROD_ID = #{prod_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROD(prod_id, prod_name, prod_desc, prod_price, prod_added_date, category_id, member_id) VALUES(#{prod_id}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_desc}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_added_date}, #{category_id}, #{member_id})
